channel.title: My run-server doesn't work for people using my no-ip
channel.description:
Hi all, I want to use my run.server instead of compile+run.
But when I use the run.server, it only let me on using localhost, but the no-ip won't work, this is what is in it:
[code]@echo off COLOR 07 title PkMadScape Run-Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
is that what should be in it?

item.source: My run-server doesn't work for people using my no-ip

item.title: My run-server doesn't work for people using my no-ip
item.dc:creator: @scooper619 scooper619
item.description:
@scooper619 wrote:

erm,
well you will probaly NOT need that, i use hamachi not no-ip but my friends use no-ip. have you port forwarded if not then NO-ONE may be able to get on. some computers need portforwarding
if not thrn try this
www.portforward.com
then go to “download pf config”
download it
then select your router and make an application with ucp and tcp 43594 and press ok.
once done that you have to try and run the server AGAIN and tell me what happens,
ok
not a problem with your help
have done it before
if it doesnt work then use hamachi
thanks,
scooper619

Read full topic
